text: Nice Synagogue. The Nice Synagogue is a historic synagogue in Nice, Alpes- Maritimes, France. It was built in 1885, and dedicated in 1886. It has been listed as an official national monument since April 17, 2004. ==References== Category:Synagogues completed in 1886 Category:Monuments historiques of Nice Category:Synagogues in France
title: Nice Synagogue
